timeline.bodyText: I think we should refactor this method and separate this part out. isValid method is doing more than validation - such as mutating state in local store.
timeline.author: CuriousVini

replies.bodyText: Separate this part out means the caller to this method to do it?? But the information about that it is fetching remotely doesn't go out of this method.
replies.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: Would it be a good idea to throw NotFoundException in isValid when program is not present and do insertion logic in the caller.
replies.author: CuriousVini

replies.bodyText: No. It is intentional to populate the cache with a false so that we don't need to keep making remote call in case someone is calling this with a program run that is not runnning.
